title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it makes a beeping sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also produces the same bell sound.
EB: When I choose SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it should not make a beeping sound. Clicking on other buttons should not produce the bell sound.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application. 
2. Select the option SWT.MULTI. 
3. Observe that the application makes a beeping sound. 
4. Click on other buttons in the application. 
5. Observe that the same beeping sound is produced.
